issue.title: Ignition GUI: Links in the image selection dropdown menu are mixed up

content.raw:
@John Shepherd, 

Sorry, I totally forgot to answer you. I now checked it again and used the command: 

`./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=simple_tunnel_03 robotName1:=X1n1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName2:=X2n2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName3:=X3n3 robotConfig3:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`

So the most left robot is an X1, the robot in the middle is an X2 and the robot on the right is an X3 copter. 

After switching a little bit between the three images I got:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3880845302-Bildschirmfoto_von_2020-03-10_22-17-56.png)
The image is named X1n1 but it is obviously from the X3 copter.

And after switching again a little bit between the images I got:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1210696411-Bildschirmfoto_von_2020-03-10_22-19-45.png)
Now the same image is named X2n2. That does not fit.
content.html:
@John Shepherd,

Sorry, I totally forgot to answer you. I now checked it again and used the command:

./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=simple_tunnel_03 robotName1:=X1n1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName2:=X2n2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName3:=X3n3 robotConfig3:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1

So the most left robot is an X1, the robot in the middle is an X2 and the robot on the right is an X3 copter.

After switching a little bit between the three images I got:

The image is named X1n1 but it is obviously from the X3 copter.

And after switching again a little bit between the images I got:

Now the same image is named X2n2. That does not fit.
